snippet.title: MORDHAU - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Mordhau Steam key from the webshop (developers get more money): https://mordhau.com/shop/
Buy Mordhau on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/629760/MORDHAU/

Get Mordhau Merch: https://mordhau.com/shop
Mordhau is a multiplayer medieval fighting game where fights range from duels all the way to large, open battles of up to 64 players with horses, siege engines, and castles to be stormed. It features a skill-based free-flowing combat system that is easy to learn, but hard to master.

Visit http://www.mordhau.com for more information.

http://www.facebook.com/mordhaugame
http://www.twitter.com/mordhaugame
